annotations.title: How To Use J채germeister Like An Adult in 6 Cocktails

textContent:
1 1/2 oz Jagermeister
3/4 oz Triple Sec
3/4 oz fresh lime juice
2 tsp 2:1 simple syrup or .75 oz 1:1

Shake and pour
Garnish with lime wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gk5cxWmbxu4

---

1.5oz (45ml) Jagermeister
.75oz (22.5ml) Cointreau
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
6oz Crushed Ice.
Add to blender, blend until smooth
and pour into a DOF glass garnish with a lime wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nfN_CAcySGo
title: Jagerrita
